short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open-source browser extension providing rapid access to keyword information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the keyword infomation of your selected text with just one quick click.

★ Keyword Jumper Highlights:
✓ Absolutely free: open-sourced under the MIT license.
✓ Privacy-friendly: data is securely stored locally, no need for extra permissions.
✓ Granular control: enabling the option to toggle each tool on and off.
✓ Multiple ways of use: button, right-click menu, shortcut key
